description:
Sink your toes into soft sands and swim into shades of Maldivian blue at this sprawling island retreat, an all-inclusive tropical playground. Days in paradise begin with a delightful spread at the open-air Social House, enjoy lunch in between dips in the lagoon, and take yourself out for dinner at one of six venues.

If you're craving a late-night snack, order Ifuru Eats straight to your door so you can unwind in the privacy of your suite. Sip on refreshing poolside cocktails with daily free-flow drinks, and when adventure calls, explore the surrounding marine life with an afternoon scuba dive.

Keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre, make a splash and snorkel or kayak the pristine lagoon, and drop the little ones at the Coconut Kids Club while you indulge with a massage at Xanadu Spa & Salon. With all you could wish for and more, this recently opened retreat is the epitome of an island getaway.
